group_1.textCenter: Hey, you guys are local Magical Girls, so...
Do ya know anythin' about the Uwasa?

group_1.textRight: U-Uwasa?!

group_1.textLeft: We donâ€™t just know them, we were caught up@in one...

group_1.textRight: So, you guys also got mixed up in one of the@weird rumors goin' around?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Rumors becoming real, go figure...

group_1.textRight: So, do you know this one?
If you drink water...
Papers start droppin' from nowhere,@countin' down from 24.
Water? 24?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, weren't you talking about something@like that the other day, Kaede?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah... Do you think that was it?
What? Can you tell me?

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@[textRed:The Rumor of the Misery Water]!
There's a cooler box resting in the@basket of an old-fashioned bicycle...
Ask the man, "One cup please!"@and get ready to drink up...@Finish it off and you'll feel amazing!
But oh no, that feeling is an illusion...@The water you drank is actually cursed!
After 24 hours, the misery you washed@away with that water will cause a disaster.@This is the hottest gossip in Sankyo Ward!

group_1.textRight: Tch...Well, I was wonderin' what might@happen when the countdown hits zero...
So they hand out this free water...
And then if you drink it, some disaster comes@crashin' down on you?!
Guess I spoke too soon about being lucky.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, me and Kaede will help you out.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes! We haven't seen that water Uwasa@ourselves, but...
We fought a different one once...
Yeah, what she said.
We're not experts, but we do have some@experience dealing with Uwasa.

group_1.textRight: What? Why would you want to help me?
You really want to go another round with a@monster like that?

group_1.textLeft: It's not like we want to do these things...
Putting ourselves in danger...
But we did get to know you, even if it was@just by chance...
Besides, if you want to solve a problem,@two heads are better than one, y'know...
The more friends you have the better.
Yes.
Us Magical Girls, we have to look out for@one another!

group_1.textRight: Can I be your apprentice, Mami?

group_1.textLeft: Apprentice?

group_1.textRight: I want to study under you so I can become@a full-fledged Magical Girl.
And...don't ya think it'd be better to fight@Witches as a team of two?
If we want to save the world, we should help@each other out as Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko...
You make a good point, I agree.
And anyway, I was just thinking...
I'd love to have a fellow Magical Girl as a@friend.

group_1.textRight: Pretendin' to be righteous little goody@two-shoes... What a pain.
Don't waste my time with that garbage.
Take it. The Grief Seed from the Witch we@fought.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: It's yours. There's only one, though.
You can split it in half, since you're such@good friends and all.

group_1.textLeft: Hold on! What are you...

group_1.textRight: This game ends here. I'm leavin'.

group_1.textLeft: Wait! What's gotten into you all of a@sudden?!

group_1.textRight: ...She's gone...

group_1.textLeft: What the heck... Out of nowhere.

group_1.textRight: Did we say something that made her mad?
